subject: New Footprints Record Added: '$title'
body:
Dear #REC_NAME #REC_EMAIL,

The following data collection description has been submitted for review and publication to Deakin Research Online (DRO) and Research Data Australia (RDA) by $_owner_name ($_owner_email), and you have been listed as a party on the record:

$title

The submission will now be reviewed by DRO staff and your identification matched with the National Library records.

If you would like any information regarding Research Data Management at Deakin and the publication of data collection descriptions please visit the Manage Research Data website. If you have any concerns regarding the record submitted please contact DRO staff at drosupport@deakin.edu.au, tel: 03 52272700 or your Liaison Librarian.

Kind Regards,

Deakin eResearch

Please do not reply to this email.
